alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 10:23PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Windham, northwestern Bristol, Washington, central Newport, Kent, Providence and Bristol Counties through 1130 PM EST... At 1023 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dudley to near Willimantic to near Haddam. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Providence, Brockton, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Woonsocket, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Bridgewater, North Kingstown, Windham and Bristol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
